## Summary
- For today’s flight
	- circles well placed to sample strongest gradients
	- comparatively less intense convection in mid-ITCZ, little dust (given yesterdays forecast

- For Tuesday’s (3 Sep) flight 
	- moist area extends far to the north, no sampling of strong gradient so far, good for the south
	- moderately strong convection in ITCZ

- For transfer flight
	- be aware of NHC forecasts
